Headline: #35 31st Temporary Reroute at 31st/Lock
ShortDescription: #35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Northbound Reroute near Jeffery/83rd

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Clark/Division
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Clark/Division due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Clark/Division due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#22 Clark

#36 Broadway

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
